skill.s1.name: Crackle Surprise Box
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK Elec DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.

If the enemy is not inflicted with [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shock[/b][/i][/color], there is a [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] base chance to inflict [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shock[/b][/i][/color] for 2 turns.
If the enemy is inflicted with [color=#fcff37][i][b]Shock[/b][/i][/color], increases DMG by [color=#fcff37][b]30%[/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Exploding Brick
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK Elec DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, increases [color=#fcff37][b]DMG[/b][/color] to the main target by [color=#fcff37][b]25%[/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Super Rare Reward
skill.s3.description: Increases own [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and selects 1 ally to be BUI's [color=#a3b8fc][b][Playmate][/b][/color].

Triggers a Follow Up after [color=#a3b8fc][b][Playmate][/b][/color] deal damage with a Persona skill, makes BUI's next 2 Follow Up deal [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fcff37][b]Elec DMG[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
Increases the chance to trigger [ref=a0][color=#c3e342][b][u][★Big Project! Start★][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by a fixed [color=#fcff37][b]10%[/b][/color] chance for 2 turns.

skill.hl.description: Increases own [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] increases [color=#fcff37][b]Follow Up DMG[/b][/color] based on [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] for 2 turns.

skill.hl.description.kr-tw: Increases own [color=#fcff37][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] increases [color=#fcff37][b]Follow Up DMG[/b][/color] based on [color=#fcff37][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
